mapper.select: SELECT br.board_reply_idx, br.board_idx, br.member_idx, m.name, br.content, br.create_date FROM hgs.board_replys br LEFT OUTER JOIN members m ON(br.member_idx = m.member_idx) WHERE board_idx=${boardIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_replys (board_idx, member_idx, content) VALUES (#{boardIdx}, #{memberIdx}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE board_replys SET content=#{content}, editdate = sysdate WHERE board_reply_idx = #{boardReplyIdx}
